Duprey 4-Light Lantern Pendant

Duprey 4-Light Lantern Pendant

$98.99
$169.10
41% Off
Open Box Outlet Price: From $84.14
EVERYTHING SHIPS FREE
Ship To:
Select Finish: Rubbed Oil Bronze, $98.99
Antique Gold

Product Overview

At a Glance

  • Adjustable Height

  • Dry Location

  • Dimmable

  • Geometric lanterns are *so* in. This 4-light pendant lamp feels rustic AND refined, and is a versatile accent piece for any room. Crafted from metal, the open-sided tapered shade has a sculptural effect that's instantly eye-catching. Inside, a classic candelabra fixture holds four exposed bulbs (not included). Use the adjustable chain to hang this light fixture at the perfect height.

    Reasons to double (or triple!) up: 1. The too-good-to-be-true price tag. 2. This pendant lamp can be dimmable, so you'll get dreamy ambience every day. 3. Fits perfectly with (almost) any style: contemporary, transitional, coastal, boho-chic... You get the idea.

    What's Included?

    • Canopy
    • Bulb(s)

    Product Details

    • Number of Lights: 4
    • Fixture Design: Lantern
    • Primary Material: Metal
    • Product Warranty: one year
